scripts.format: npm run format:js && npm run lint:php:fix
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:php && npm run lint:md
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:php:fix && npm run lint:md:fix
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.pot: echo 'POT file generation requires WP-CLI. Run: wp i18n make-pot . languages/inline-context.pot --domain=inline-context'
scripts.prepackage: npm run lint:fix && npm run build
scripts.prerelease: npm run lint:fix && npm run build
